--foundry-vtt-theme.name: Enable Foundry Stylesheet
--foundry-vtt-theme.hint: Enabling this will modifiy foundry css to use colors from Lib Themer.

--foundry-vtt-colors-theme.name: Enable Foundry Colorized
--foundry-vtt-colors-theme.hint: This sheets attempts to use more colors to stylize the buttons and other elements of foundry.
